meanings.definition: In a manner relating to the measurement of light intensity on a small scale using a microscope.
meanings.sent1: She observed the cells microphotometrically to analyze their brightness.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the samples microphotometrically to determine their luminescence.
meanings.sent3: The tiny microscope danced microphotometrically on the lab bench, much to the amusement of the researchers.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail was so precise that he could see the world microphotometrically, noticing even the faintest glimmers.
meanings.sent5: The light shone microphotometrically through the lens, revealing the intricate patterns within the specimen.
